_header: Man in the Moon stands and strides
_description: Man in the Moon — five 8-line stanzas (abababab)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Mon in þe mone stond ant stritOn is bot forke is burþen
                    he bereþ…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Þah me teone wiþ hym þat myn teh myeÞe
                    cherld nul nout adoun er þe day dawe
